#Matrices and their inverses
```{r}
Sigma = matrix(c(1.0,-0.7,-0.7,1.0),nrow = 2, ncol=2)
Sigma_inv = solve(Sigma)
print(Sigma_inv)

test_inverse = Sigma %*% Sigma_inv
```

#Matrix Composition
```{r}
A = chol(Sigma)
print(A)

print(t(A))

```
